scence_script.script: Xin chào các bé! Hôm nay, chúng ta sẽ cùng nhau học các chữ cái nhé!
scence_script.prompt_image: An anime girl with brown hair in a futuristic hero costume is standing in a colorful, playful room. She is waving happily at the camera with a big, welcoming smile. The background is bright and filled with soft-shaped toys. Kids learning video, vibrant colors, cartoon style, 3D animation.
scence_script.prompt_video: An anime girl with brown hair in a futuristic hero costume stands in a colorful playroom. She waves cheerfully at the camera for a few seconds, then brings her hands together in excitement, ready to start the lesson.

scence_script.script: Đây là chữ A. A là quả táo. Các bé đọc theo chị nào, A!
scence_script.prompt_image: An anime girl with brown hair in a futuristic hero costume happily points to a large, bright red letter 'A' that has just appeared. Next to the letter, a shiny red apple is also present. The background is a sunny, cheerful meadow. Kids learning video, vibrant colors, cartoon style, 3D animation.
scence_script.prompt_video: An anime girl with brown hair in a futuristic hero costume points excitedly as a large letter 'A' and a red apple magically appear. The apple sparkles slightly. She then looks at the camera and her mouth moves as if saying 'A' clearly.

scence_script.script: Tiếp theo là chữ B. B là quả bóng. Chúng ta cùng nói to nhé, B!
scence_script.prompt_image: An anime girl with brown hair in a futuristic hero costume is looking at a large, colorful letter 'B'. A colorful beach ball is bouncing slowly beside her on a sandy beach with a clear blue sky. Kids learning video, vibrant colors, cartoon style, 3D animation.
scence_script.prompt_video: On a sunny beach, a large letter 'B' fades into view. A colorful beach ball appears and bounces gently up and down next to the anime girl. She claps her hands excitedly and watches the ball, then turns to smile at the camera.

scence_script.script: Đây là chữ C. C là con mèo. Các bé giỏi quá! C!
scence_script.prompt_image: An anime girl with brown hair in a futuristic hero costume is kneeling and gently petting a small, cute, white cartoon cat. A large, yellow letter 'C' is next to them in a cozy living room with a soft rug. Kids learning video, vibrant colors, cartoon style, 3D animation.
scence_script.prompt_video: A large letter 'C' appears in a cozy room. A cute cartoon cat walks up to the anime girl. She kneels down to gently pet the cat, which purrs and rubs against her. She looks up and gives a thumbs-up to the camera.

scence_script.script: Và đây là chữ D. D là con chó. Các bé cùng đọc lại nào, D!
scence_script.prompt_image: An anime girl with brown hair in a futuristic hero costume is laughing while playing with a happy cartoon puppy in a green park. A large, blue letter 'D' is visible nearby. The puppy is wagging its tail enthusiastically. Kids learning video, vibrant colors, cartoon style, 3D animation.
scence_script.prompt_video: In a green park, a large letter 'D' appears. A happy cartoon puppy runs towards the anime girl, wagging its tail. She laughs and playfully pats the puppy's head, showing affection and joy.

scence_script.script: Tuyệt vời! Chúng ta đã học A, B, C, và D. Các bé thật là thông minh!
scence_script.prompt_image: An anime girl with brown hair in a futuristic hero costume stands proudly in the center as the letters A, B, C, D and their images (apple, ball, cat, dog) pop up around her with little sparkles. Colorful, abstract background. Kids learning video, vibrant colors, cartoon style, 3D animation.
scence_script.prompt_video: The anime girl claps her hands, and the letters A, B, C, D, along with an apple, a ball, a cat, and a dog, appear around her. She points to each letter and object sequentially with a bright, encouraging smile.

scence_script.script: Buổi học hôm nay đến đây là hết rồi. Tạm biệt và hẹn gặp lại các bé nhé!
scence_script.prompt_image: An anime girl with brown hair in a futuristic hero costume is waving goodbye with both hands, smiling sweetly at the camera. The background is a soft, colorful sunset sky with a few twinkling stars. Kids learning video, vibrant colors, cartoon style, 3D animation.
scence_script.prompt_video: Against a beautiful sunset background, the anime girl waves goodbye with both hands. She gives a final, happy wink to the camera before the scene slowly fades to black.

music_prompt: Upbeat, cheerful, and simple acoustic music for a children's educational video. A gentle melody with a ukulele, soft percussion, and happy xylophone sounds, creating a positive and encouraging mood. The tempo is steady and pleasant, perfect for a learning activity.
